title: mAyai ellAm kaDandavanE
sahitya:
mAyai ellAm kaDandavanE pazhani malai tanil amarndiDum murugA guhanE


anupallavi

  tUya mei ANDiyAi tulangiDubavanE tol vinai nIkkiDum nal vElavanE


caraNam    pazhamE nI enru parivuDanE anru pagarndanar umaiyin shivapara poruLum nanru
pazham nI enradanAl pazhani ANDi enum padam adai peTravanE hitam enakkaruLvAyE
